posts.post_content:
Walsh $80 shipped SOLD
Bresnahan $55 shipped SOLD
PM or email [url]tiger8mush@yahoo.com[/url]

The Walsh has no creases, with strong corners and edges.  OC to bottom, some weird surface or ink imperfection on his face, clean bold back.

Bresnahan has a couple of creases that don't show well in the scan.  One diagonally at top left corner, the other horizontal starting left edge near smoke stack ending 1/2 way thru arm.  OC to right, wear to corners, light soiling on back.

Rob
:)
